TopicTitle: What happened to Ksp Weekly news?

Articles.Content:
I don't want to be "That Guy" ,but where did the ksp weekly news go?

Are they too busy putting the forums back together or is there just no news to report?

I hope they aren't gone forever.
It's not gone forever, its just been on hold until the forums are fixed completely and new backup measures has been added.
C7 made a post to his own dev blog this week. That might be enough to tide you over.

It's not gone forever, its just been on hold until the forums are fixed completely and new backup measures has been added.

Is that not news? Just because the forum is down does not mean community activity was on pause.

get your fix here.

Have a nice day!

Ah ah ah, I got another one.

What happened to ca. 2 Week Update cycle?!?

I know, I know, but something in me wanted to say that.
